topics.title: Algebra
topics.description: Learn the basics of algebra, including variables, equations, and systems of equations.

topics.title: Geometry
topics.description: Discover the world of shapes and their properties, including angles, lines, and polygons.

topics.title: Calculus
topics.description: Take your math skills to the next level with calculus, covering limits, derivatives, and integrals.

topics.title: JavaScript
topics.description: Learn the programming language of the web, including data types, functions, and control flow.

topics.title: Python
topics.description: Explore the versatile and easy-to-learn programming language, including data structures, functions, and modules.

topics.title: Java
topics.description: Get a solid foundation in object-oriented programming with Java, including classes, objects, and inheritance.

topics.title: Mechanics
topics.description: Learn about the laws of motion, forces, energy, and momentum.

topics.title: Thermodynamics
topics.description: Understand the concepts of temperature, heat, and energy transfer, including the laws of thermodynamics.

topics.title: Electromagnetism
topics.description: Explore the fundamental principles of electricity and magnetism, including electric fields, magnetic fields, and electromagnetic waves.

topics.title: Renaissance Art
topics.description: Explore the art and culture of the Renaissance period, including works by Leonardo da Vinci, Michelangelo, and Raphael.

topics.title: Impressionism
topics.description: Learn about the art movement that changed the way we see the world, including works by Claude Monet, Pierre-Auguste Renoir, and Edgar Degas.

topics.title: Modern Art
topics.description: Learn about the art movement that changed the way we see the world, including works by Claude Monet, Pierre-Auguste Renoir, and Edgar Degas.
